results.text: You know the environment can tell you a lot about the potential hazards you might come across in your travels. You identify one piece of Key Knowledge related to creature types, natural hazards, or other environmental hazards you may encounter in this region.
You have studied and tracked weather patterns, giving you some insight into what may happen next. You accurately predict the weather for the following day.
You notice an odd rock formation nearby that’s the telltale sign of something interesting. You find a mineable vein of precious or semi-precious stones worth 50 gp.

Certain plants grow near one another, and you know just what to look for to find something useful. You find a combination of rare plants necessary to craft a basic healing potion. These plants must be prepared as normal, requiring 1 hour and a DC 10 Nature check.

You know the field is the best place to observe the beasts and plants you’ve spent so much time reading about. You are under the effects of the spell @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.3fqncxt9imp9n4zc]{Locate Animals or Plants}.
Being out in nature is providing you many opportunities to test your knowledge. You have advantage on your next Nature check.
